title: New game mode gave me a deep sadness in my heart.
body: I started up a game, thinking it was ARURF (because I can read) and after about 5 minuets I realised my mana was almost gone. I thought it was a bit strange until I realised my cool downs were super long too. After I the game ended, I looked up what the game mode was really called and that's when I saw the ARSR :/ This made me very sad and I just wanted to make a post here saying how sad I am. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
